title: What's News: Business & Finance
text:
The S&P 500, Dow and Nasdaq rose 1.8%, 1.6% and 2.2%, respectively, for the week, following a strong streak of earnings reports.

Walmart is helping launch a new company that aims to provide financial services for its millions of customers and workers.

The Boeing ex-employee charged with misleading air-safety regulators about a flight-control system that played a significant role in two 737 MAX crashes is being unfairly blamed for the disasters, his attorney said.

China's central bank said that the risk of Evergrande's debt crisis spilling over into the financial system was controllable.

What's News: Business & Finance
